title: So riot...
body: We going to nerf {{champion:28}}  or {{champion:104}} soon?

replies.body: they mind as well let ryze have a passive of unlimited tear stacking, but nerf all his damage by 50%. yup. shit early game, crazy 40 minute damage.
While it is funny, I would actually play that.
riot has been gearing up for worlds for the past few months, so no.
